results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(e mod p).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^(e mod p).
program: (PARI) A327938(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(k=1, #f~, f[k,2] = (f[k,2]%f[k,1])); factorback(f); };
xref: Differs from A065883 for the first time at n=27.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 01 2019
